title: Falafel With Black Olives and Harissa Recipe
full_text:
Falafel With Black Olives and Harissa Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
50 mins
Active
25 mins
Total
55 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
recipe
Easy, Herb-Packed Falafel
3
tablespoons
(
45
ml
)
fresh harissa paste
or store-bought
harissa paste
3
ounces
pitted black olives
(about
1/2
cup
;
85
g
), roughly chopped
Tahini sauce
,
hummus
, and/or
zhug (Yemenite hot sauce)
for serving
Directions
Complete
Easy, Herb-Packed Falafel
recipe through the end of step 2. Add harissa and black olives to falafel mixture and fold in gently with a rubber spatula. Continue cooking falafel as directed, starting with step 3. Serve with
zhug
or
tahini sauce
.
Special equipment
Salad spinner, food processor, instant-read thermometer
